tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Availability_By_Region (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alternative_id INT,
  region_name TEXT,
  availability_status TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (alternative_id) REFERENCES Plastic_Alternatives(id)
);

CREATE TABLE alternatives_inventory (
   inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   alternative_id INT,
   region_id INT,
   quantity INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (alternative_id) REFERENCES plastic_alternatives(alternative_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alternative_inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alternative_id INT,
  region_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (alternative_id) REFERENCES plastic_alternative(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES availability_regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alternative_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alternative_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (alternative_id) REFERENCES plastic_alternative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE alternative_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  alternative_id UUID,
  user_name TEXT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT
);
